            "title": [
              [
                "[1, 3, 5, 7, 9].reduce((seq, n) => {\n    return seq.then(() => {\n        console.log(n);\n        return new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 1000));\n    });\n}, Promise.resolve()).then(\n    () => console.log('done'),\n    (e) => console.log(e)\n);\n// will log 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 'done' in 1s intervals"

            ]

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "the “catch” reduction, which builds a chain that continues as long as the chain experiences error."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "bulleted_list",
          "version": 1

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "var working_resource = 5; // one of the values from the source array\n[1, 3, 5, 7, 9].reduce((seq, n) => {\n    return seq.catch(() => {\n        console.log(n);\n        if(n === working_resource) { // 5 is working\n            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => setTimeout(() => resolve(n), 1000));\n        } else { // all other values are not working\n            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => setTimeout(reject, 1000));\n        }\n    });\n}, Promise.reject()).then(\n    (n) => console.log('success at: ' + n),\n    () => console.log('total failure')\n);\n// will log 1, 3, 5, 'success at 5' at 1s intervals"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 3
        }
      },

            "title": [
              ["We manually append a "],
              [
                ".then(successHandler, errorHandler)",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise/then"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [" after the reduce, to execute "],
              ["successHandler", [["c"]]],
              [
                " once all the previous steps have resolved. If any step was to fail, then "
              ],
              ["errorHandler", [["c"]]],
              [" would execute."]
            ]
